item.title: Ok finishing the error i just posted
item.dc:creator: @qw3rty qw3rty
item.description:
@qw3rty wrote:

i fixed some errors and got it down to 3 errors
so far ive tried moving the }
it dident help
here is a model of a commnd that worked…
in red ):
}
} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) &&

command.length() > 5) {
if(muted == 1)
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
else
PlayerHandler.messageToAll =

playerName+": "+command.substring(5);(there is more i just left it out)

now the commnad im having problems with is ( in green ):
}
} else if (command.startsWith(“modzone”) &&

playerRights >=1)
{
sendMessage(“woot u mod or admin ! u in mod zone @$!#!”);
teleX =3255;
teleY =3435;

}

that is what my client .java said
here is what my compiler said was wrong( in blue ):
client.java:10271: illegal start of type
} else if (command.startsWith(“modzone”) && playerRights >=1)
^
client.java:10271: expected
} else if (command.startsWith(“modzone”) && playerRights >=1)
^
client.java:10271: illegal start of type
} else if (command.startsWith(“modzone”) && playerRights >=1)
^
3 errors

i need help plz :eek:

also :if some 1 would like to explain what a identifyer is also i would be appreciative also
i would like to know what the carrot or the upsidedown v ment when it is under a word ( i know it means a error but what else , like when 1 appears what do i do about it in my client.java )

Read full topic
